scopecontent.head: Scope and Content Information
scopecontent.p: The collection consists of three letters from Churchill to James B. Pond.

did.unittitle: Winston Churchill to Major James B. Pond 1900 June 28

scopecontent.p: Does not want him to interpret his letter as an agreement to Pond's offer; unwilling to do what Pond asks.

did.unittitle: Winston Churchill to Major James B. Pond 1901 June 22

scopecontent.p: Grateful for Pond's comments on The Crisis; could not use Pond's suggestion to use John Brown in the book. Appreciates the suggestion about Benjamin Chopin; worried about the part of Lincoln in the play

did.unittitle: Winston Churchill to Major James B. Pond 1901 September 4

scopecontent.p: Does not want care how the British want to interpret The Crisis; does not care if it sells in England at all; wrote book for the American public.
